item.title: Blogposts
item.description: Welcome! ğŸ“… November 2 2022 Welcome to our website! The website was set up using a framework called Hugo, which is a great tool for setting up static websites quickly. One of the advantages of Hugo over e.g. Wordpress is speed. Hugo is able to generate pages in less than 1 millisecond. You can read more about it on their website.
